body.p: For a lease modification that is not accounted for as a separate lease, the lessee shall account for the remeasurement of the lease liability by:

li.p: decreasing the carrying amount of the right-of-use asset to reflect the partial or full termination of the lease for lease modifications that decrease the scope of the lease. The lessee shall recognise in profit or loss any gain or loss relating to the partial or full termination of the lease.
making a corresponding adjustment to the right-of-use asset for all other lease modifications.
